briefTitle: Extended Follow up of the TARGIT-A Trial
officialTitle: Extended Follow up of the TARGIT-A Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Long-term follow-up through direct patient contact
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients who participated in the TARGIT-A trial (NCT00983684).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any patient who has withdrawn consent for further follow-up, or died.
